name: Queen Bed near subway, short distance to Fenway
description:
Enjoy a comfortable queen size bed in the heart of Roxbury!

The space
Single family house located across the street from Roxbury Community College and the Reggie Lewis Athletic center. 75 yards from Roxbury Crossing MBTA Station and 5 minute walk to Northeastern University. 10 minute subway ride to Downtown Boston The Room itself includes: Tv, Roku Player (Free Netflix), AC, Portable Space Heater, A computer desk and chair. One closet.

Guest access
Guest's have access to a full kitchen, two bathrooms and a very comfortable living room area. Kitchen also includes coffee maker, toaster, and a microwave

Other things to note
Street Parking: Street cleaning on Tuesdays between 8 AM-12 Noon April to November


**IMPORTANT NOTICE**

I can NOT accommodate early arrivals or dropping off of luggage ahead of the 3pm check in time under any circumstance.

License number
STR-383502
